mapper.insert: insert into recommend(recommend_no , bno , user_id) values((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(recommend_no), 0) + 1 FROM recommend),#{bno} ,#{userId})
mapper.delete: delete from recommend where bno = #{bno} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update recommend set recommend_check = 1 where bno = #{bno} and user_id = #{userId}
update recommend set recommend_check = 0 where bno = #{bno} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from recommend where bno = #{bno} and user_id = #{userId}
